member.name: M:ConsoleExtensions.Proxy.TestHelpers.TestProxy.ReadKey(System.ConsoleKeyInfo@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Obtains the next character or function key pressed by the user. The pressed key is optionally displayed in the console window.
member.param: An object that describes the constant and Unicode character, if any, that correspond to the pressed console key. The object also describes, in a bitwise combination of values, whether one or more Shift, Alt, or Ctrl modifier keys was pressed simultaneously with the console key.
Determines whether to display the pressed key in the console window. true to not display the pressed key; otherwise, false.
member.exception: Thrown when no more keys exists in the queue.
